titleStmt.title: Spiritual melody, containing near three hundred sacred hymns. By Benjamin Keach, author of Trhopolgia, pastor of the Church of Christ meeting on Horsly-down, Southwark
titleStmt.author: Keach, Benjamin, 1640-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Hancock, in Castle-Alley, near the Royal-Exchange in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: With a table of contents, errata on p. [24], and an advertisment at the foot of p. 384.
Reproduction of the original at the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: Castle-Alley, near the Royal-Exchange in Cornhill
